General.Name: Beijing Water Business Doctor
General.Description: Beijing Water Business Doctor Co., Ltd. engages in water engineering and operation, hazardous and solid waste treatment, environmental protection, and equipment manufacturing businesses in China. It operates through four segments: Industrial Water Treatment, Waste Disposal Service, Financial Investment, and Chemical Processing. The company constructs industrial water treatment plants; and provides solid waste and oil-based drilling cuttings waste services, as well as processes chemical materials and invests in funds. Beijing Water Business Doctor Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
